cyclone.name: HAROLD
cyclone.current_location: about 375 miles east-southeast of Port Mansfield, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: moving quickly westward and expected to cross the south-central Texas coast Tuesday then continue inland toward northern Mexico
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: south Texas coast near Baffin Bay/Port Mansfield

weather_observation.warning_coast: Mouth of Rio Grande to Port O'Connor, Texas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: South Texas coastline from the Mouth of the Rio Grande northward to Sargent, TX
weather_observation.wind: Occasional breezy conditions possible; tropical-storm-force winds unlikely
weather_observation.rainfall: Only light, sporadic outer-band showers possible; heavy rainfall concentrated far south of port
weather_observation.other_hazards: None anticipated that would disrupt port operations
